name: Manas Khatua
content: Manas Khatua Dr. Manas Khatua Associate Professor Computer Science and Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati Guwahati, Assam, India - 781039. manaskhatua[at]iitg[dot]ac[dot]in manaskhatua[at]gmail[dot]com BIOGRAPHY:: Dr. Manas Khatua is working as Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati since 2024. Prior to this, he was an Assistant Professor in the same department from 2018 to 2024. He was also an Assistant Professor in the Dept. of CSE at Indian Institute of Technology Jodhpur from 2016 to 2018. Before joining in teaching profession, he worked as Post-Doctoral Research Fellow in Singapore University of Technology and Design, and Assistant System Engineer in Tata Consultancy Services Kolkata. He received his Ph.D. from Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur in 2016. His primary research interests are in the domain of Networks, specifically Internet of Things, Wireless Networks, Sensor Networks, Network Security, Cloud and Edge Computing, Cyber Physical Systems and Network Performance Evaluation. He is the author of many scholarly research papers, including reputed journal papers, in the above mentioned areas. :: COURSE on Internet of Things (IoT) :: Developed an elective course on IoT at IIT Guwahati.
